name: International relations
description: International relations (IR), sometimes referred to as international studies and international affairs, is the scientific study of interactions between sovereign states.[2] In a broader sense, it concerns all activities between states—such as war, diplomacy, trade, and foreign policy—as well as relations with and among other international actors, such as intergovernmental organisations (IGOs), international nongovernmental organisations (INGOs), international legal bodies, and multinational corporations (MNCs)
